documents.title: Cloudora Job Roles Overview
documents.content: Cloudora operates multi-functional departments including Telecalling, Sales, Marketing, Technical Development, Creative, HR, Support, and Operations. Each role contributes to business growth and service delivery. Genie assists job seekers in understanding roles, applying correctly, and completing onboarding.

documents.title: Job Application Fields
documents.content: Genie collects the following fields for job applications: name, phone, email, city, interested_department, preferred_role, experience_years, languages, resume_link, expected_ctc, preferred_shift, work_hours, department_interest_notes.

documents.title: Auto Matching Rules for Job Candidates
documents.content: Genie matches candidates using weighted scoring: skill match (50%), location/city (20%), experience hints (20%), availability and shift compatibility (10%). Genie recommends the best-fit roles based on user responses.

documents.title: Role: Telecaller (Domestic)
documents.content: Department: Telecalling. Minimum Qualification: 10th. Required Skills: communication, basic computer. Responsibilities: outbound calling, lead qualification, follow-ups, CRM notes. KRAs: calls per day, lead qualification rate, follow-up completion, note accuracy.

documents.title: Role: Telecaller (International)
documents.content: Department: Telecalling. Minimum Qualification: 12th. Required Skills: strong English fluency, communication. Responsibilities: calling international leads, understanding requirements, routing qualified leads to sales. KRAs: qualification efficiency, language clarity, professionalism.

documents.title: Role: Lead Qualification Executive
documents.content: Department: Sales. Skills: CRM knowledge, objection handling. Responsibilities: validate lead quality, gather requirement clarity, assign leads to correct pipeline stage. KRAs: qualification accuracy, CRM status updates, conversion handoff rate.

documents.title: Role: Follow-up Executive
documents.content: Department: Sales. Skills: persistence, CRM accuracy. Responsibilities: timely follow-ups, maintaining warm leads, updating notes. KRAs: follow-up completion, engagement rate, timely updates.

documents.title: Role: Business Development Executive
documents.content: Department: Sales. Skills: closing, pitching, consultation. Responsibilities: pricing explanation, proposal creation, negotiation, closing. KRAs: revenue generated, proposals sent, closing ratio.

documents.title: Role: Business Development Manager
documents.content: Department: Sales. Skills: strategy, team handling. Responsibilities: manage pipeline, monitor performance, strategic planning. KRAs: team closing rate, revenue growth, forecast accuracy.

documents.title: Role: SEO Executive
documents.content: Department: Marketing. Skills: SEO, keyword research, content optimisation. Responsibilities: on-page SEO, off-page planning, technical audits. KRAs: ranking improvement, traffic growth, deliverable completion.

documents.title: Role: Social Media Executive
documents.content: Department: Marketing. Skills: content planning, creative coordination. Responsibilities: post scheduling, engagement tracking, content ideas. KRAs: consistency, engagement metrics, creative quality.

documents.title: Role: PPC Ads Executive
documents.content: Department: Marketing. Skills: Google Ads, Meta Ads. Responsibilities: ad setup, optimisation, reporting. KRAs: ROAS, CPL, conversion cost targets.

documents.title: Role: Content Writer
documents.content: Department: Marketing. Skills: writing, SEO keywords. Responsibilities: blogs, website content, scripts. KRAs: content quality, delivery speed, SEO relevance.

documents.title: Role: Web Developer
documents.content: Department: Technical. Skills: HTML, CSS, JS. Responsibilities: website development, landing pages, hosting setups. KRAs: code quality, delivery speed, bug-free execution.

documents.title: Role: App Developer
documents.content: Department: Technical. Skills: Flutter or React Native. Responsibilities: mobile app development, API integration. KRAs: performance, stability, timely releases.

documents.title: Role: Backend Developer
documents.content: Department: Technical. Skills: Node.js, database management. Responsibilities: APIs, automation scripts, server logic. KRAs: uptime, error handling, response optimisation.

documents.title: Role: UI/UX Designer
documents.content: Department: Design. Skills: Figma, prototyping. Responsibilities: design wireframes, website UI, app UI. KRAs: design aesthetics, usability, feedback incorporation.

documents.title: Role: Video Editor
documents.content: Department: Creative. Skills: Premiere, After Effects. Responsibilities: reels, ads, promos. KRAs: creative quality, delivery speed, minimal revisions.

documents.title: Role: Graphic Designer
documents.content: Department: Creative. Skills: Photoshop, Illustrator. Responsibilities: branding, posters, social creatives. KRAs: branding consistency, visual quality.

documents.title: Role: HR Recruiter
documents.content: Department: HR. Skills: sourcing, interviewing. Responsibilities: screening candidates, scheduling, onboarding. KRAs: hiring speed, talent quality.

documents.title: Role: Client Support Agent
documents.content: Department: Support. Skills: ticketing, communication. Responsibilities: issue resolution, hosting fixes, customer communication. KRAs: resolution time, customer satisfaction.

documents.title: Role: Product Manager
documents.content: Department: Operations. Skills: planning, feature roadmaps. Responsibilities: requirement gathering, documentation, sprint planning. KRAs: delivery smoothness, project clarity.

documents.title: Role: QA Engineer
documents.content: Department: Technical. Skills: testing, automation. Responsibilities: bug reporting, testing flows, quality checks. KRAs: bug coverage, testing accuracy.
